title: Dennis O'Rourke: Filmmaker
creator_credit: AFTRS and Television and Radio School
brief_description: Dennis O’Rourke talks to Peter Thompson about his film “Cannibal Tours”. He discusses moral issues concerning the cultures of Western tourists and the people of Papua New Guinea.
description: Dennis O’Rourke talks to Peter Thompson about his film “Cannibal Tours”. He discusses moral issues concerning the cultures of Western tourists and the people of Papua New Guinea.
